resources.string: NIT Agartala News and Notification app

This application has been designed to facilitate staying up to date with Notices that are posted on NIT Agartala Website. \n\nAll notices are fetched from the NIT Agartala official website - https://nita.ac.in/ . This app does not generate content on its own. Please visit the referred website above for details on contact and notice sources.

Ananda Bibek Ray, M.Tech, CSE (2015-17)
Lead developer 

Suman Deb, Asst. Prof, CSE
Guide and Coordinator 

Osman Gani, Dimitra Debnath, B.Tech, CSE (2013-17)
Testing & Feedback 


The source code for this app is open sourced at https://github.com/anandbibek/NITA_Notifications. Repo is currently private to reduce security risks. Please reach out to me if you are interested in being a part. 

Any feedback and contribution is most welcome.
Push notifications on new updates posted on NITA Website
